goto_previous_page_via_arrow: xpath, //*[@id='paginateTop']/a[contains(@class,'arrowLeft')] || cssSelector, #filterResultsTop .pagination li.prevPage div || cssSelector, #filterResultsBottom .pagination li.prevPage div
goto_next_page_via_arrow: xpath, //*[@id='paginateTop']/a[contains(@class,'arrowRight')] || cssSelector, #filterResultsTop .pagination li.nextPage div || cssSelector, #filterResultsBottom .pagination li.nextPage div
goto_each_number_link: xpath, //*[@id='paginateTop']/a[contains(@class,'paginationSpacer')] || xpath, //*[@id='paginateTop']/a || cssSelector, #filterResultsTop .pagination li || cssSelector, #filterResultsBottom .pagination li
